Submodules

corebehrt.azure.environment module

corebehrt.azure.environment.build()[source]

Build the CoreBEHRT environment.

corebehrt.azure.environment.create_conda_cfg() → None[source]

Create a conda config based on a requirements.txt

The config file is save to TMP_CONDA_FILE. The requirements are read from REQUIREMENTS_FILE

corebehrt.azure.environment.remove_conda_cfg() → None[source]

Clean-up the temporary conda file
